comments: Gasol (TOR) does not make contact that affects Drummond's (DET) driving shot attempt.
LLB shows Lowry (TOR) gathers on his left foot and establishes his right foot as his pivot foot. He then slides that pivot foot before going up for the shot attempt.
Green (TOR) sets the screen on Jackson (DET) and does not deliver contact.
Green (TOR) makes marginal contact with Jackson (DET) and does not affect his SQBR.
Gasol (TOR) sets the screen on Jackson (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Jackson (DET) makes contact with Gasol (TOR) and affects his SQBR as he disengages from the screen.
Gasol (TOR) firms up in Jackson's (DET) path while setting the screen and does not deliver contact.
Jackson (DET) clamps Gasol's (TOR) arm and affects his ability to get the loose ball.
Drummond (DET) sets the screen on Green (TOR) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Jackson (DET) hops on the same foot after he has gathered the ball.
Green (TOR) sets the screen on Griffin (DET) and does not deliver contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Green (TOR) moves his foot heel-to-toe to create space.
Drummond (DET) legally contests Green's (TOR) jump shot attempt.
Gasol (TOR) and Ellington (DET) briefly engage and separate during the rebound.
Gasol (TOR) makes marginal contact with Drummond (DET) during the rebound.
There is no conclusive angle that shows if Jackson (DET) gets part of his hand under the ball during the drive.
Lowry (TOR) does not make contact that affects Brown's (DET) ability to secure the pass.
Correctly called 24 second violation.

Gasol (TOR) moves laterally into Griffin (DET) as he drives along the baseline.  The basket is waved off because officials deem that the shot attempt passes behind the backboard, which is considered out of bounds.  There is no clear and conclusive video evidence that shows that Griffin's shot attempt definitively does not pass behind the backboard so it is not considered a legal shot attempt.
Griffin (DET) sets the screen on Green (TOR) and does not deliver contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Griffin (DET) slides his pivot foot before releasing his dribble.
Green (TOR) moves into Griffin (DET) and makes contact that affects his SQBR.
Siakam (TOR) sets the screen on Ellington (DET) and does not deliver contact.
Ellington (DET) briefly gets his arms around Siakam (TOR), but slides them off.
Drummond (DET) jumps and maintains a legal vertical position while defending Siakam's (TOR) shot attempt and contact to Siakam's arm is incidental.
Gasol (TOR) sets the screen on Ellington (DET) and does not deliver contact.
RAR shows Green (TOR) makes contact with Jackson's (DET) arm and affects his ability to gather and pass the ball.

LLS shows Lowry (TOR) does not make contact with Drummond's (DET) arm during his shot attempt. Gasol (TOR) moves into Drummond and makes contact with his arm that affects his shot attempt. The shooting foul should have been assessed to Gasol.
Ellington (DET) makes contact with Green's (TOR) lower body during his shooting motion and affects his jump shot attempt.
Siakam (TOR) reaches over Jackson (DET) and makes incidental contact with his head while going for the  loose ball.
Green (TOR) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Jackson (DET).
Ellington (DET) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Lowry (TOR).
Anunoby (TOR) commits a take foul on Kennard (DET).
Drummond (DET) maintains a legal guarding position on Gasol (TOR) during the shot attempt.
Brown (DET) makes marginal contact with Lowry (TOR) during the rebound and does not affect his ability to get the loose ball.
Gasol (TOR) commits a take foul on Griffin (DET).
